column31: "A medical expert asked the FDA to base the proposed vape and heated tobacco regulation on science, and not on fiction in the wake of the beleaguered agency’s admission it received funding from foreign anti-tobacco organizations."
column35: FDA told to base heated tobacco rules on science
column36: A medical expert asked the Food and Drugs Administration to base the proposed vape and heated tobacco regulation on science, and not on fiction in the wake of the beleaguered agencys admission it received funding from foreign anti-tobacco organizations.
